data.caption: Audited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results For The Quarter/Year Ended 31St March 2023.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33(3) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter/ year ended 31st March, 2023 along with Auditors' Report, declaration under Regulation 33(3)(d) of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 and copy of Press Release.
Please note that the Board meeting commenced at 02.00 P.M. on 20th May, 2023 and concluded at 5.50 P.M. on 20th May, 2023.
